docs.snippet: LEAD: Not long after a South Carolina schoolteacher sent his manuscript to a New York literary agent, the agent, Julian Bach, telephoned him to report that Houghton Mifflin had accepted the novel for $7,500....
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Not long after a South Carolina schoolteacher sent his manuscript to a New York literary agent, the agent, Julian Bach, telephoned him to report that Houghton Mifflin had accepted the novel for $7,500.

docs.snippet: LEAD: NEXT Friday, Steven Spielberg's controversial movie ''The Color Purple'' will reopen in 725 theaters nationwide, just three months after the 1985 film was taken out of release. The decision to have a new theatrical opening, with a large-scal...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: NEXT Friday, Steven Spielberg's controversial movie ''The Color Purple'' will reopen in 725 theaters nationwide, just three months after the 1985 film was taken out of release. The decision to have a new theatrical opening, with a large-scale national advertising campaign and new promotional material, is an unusual marketing strategy, since most films are released for video shortly after their first theatrical run.

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: ''I wonder,'' an old parishioner asks, referring to a legendary Chicago priest, ''what Pat Mulloy would think of this 'Untouchables'?'' He means the $20 million Paramount film saga of Treasury agent Eliot Ness's Prohibition-era war against Al Capone that is to be released in June. headline.main: CAPONE'S CHICAGO STIRS AGAIN FOR 'THE UNTOUCHABLES'

docs.snippet: LEAD: College Basketball Notre Dame 63, Maryland 50: Scott Hicks scored 14 points, and David Rivers and Donald Royal added 13 each, as Notre Dame held off a brief Maryland rally last night in College Park, Md. The victory was the sixth in a row fo...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: College Basketball Notre Dame 63, Maryland 50: Scott Hicks scored 14 points, and David Rivers and Donald Royal added 13 each, as Notre Dame held off a brief Maryland rally last night in College Park, Md. The victory was the sixth in a row for Notre Dame after two losses to start the season. Maryland suffered its first loss in three games.
